skins.name: Aemeath
skins.description: A piloting suit prepared by the Startorch Academy for the Exostrider’s Synchronists. Its flowing hem flickers with digital distortion, swaying softly as the ghost moves soundlessly through the academy. This suit is generated from her memories—proof that she was once human.

tags.name: Tune Rupture Response
tags.description: Deals Tune Rupture DMG to targets

tags.name: Fusion Burst
tags.description: Utilizes Fusion Burst for combat advantage

tags.name: DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

271.name: Gilded Glimmer of the First Dawn
271.description: In Instant Response, Heavy Attack - Aemeath and Heavy Attack - Mech gain {2} Crit. DMG increase and continuously pull in nearby target while charging. When Aemeath remains in the a state that meets all of the following conditions over {1}s, she enters Instant Response: Brilliance: - Out of combat - Not performing Heavy Attack - Aemeath, Heavy Attack - Mech, and Resonance Liberation Heavenfall Edict: Finale. Instant Response: Brilliance inherits all effects of Instant Response and remains active even out of the duration of Heavenfall Edict: Unbound. In Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture or Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst, when Aemeath defeats a target affected by Rupturous Trail/Fusion Trail, she enters Sealed Trail - Tune Rupture/Sealed Trail - Fusion Burst for {3}s. When Aemeath defeats a target affected by Sealed Trail - Tune Rupture or Sealed Trail - Fusion Burst, record the highest stack count of Rupturous Trail/Fusion Trail among the targets defeated. Her next skill that directly damages the target immediately inflicts the targets with the recorded stacks of Rupturous Trail/Fusion Trail, up to the current max limit of Rupturous Trail/Fusion Trail. This removes the Sealed Trail - Tune Rupture/Sealed Trail - Fusion Burst on the target and the target cannot be inflicted with Sealed Trail - Tune Rupture or Sealed Trail - Fusion Burst for {4}s.

272.name: Downy Notes of Snowfluff
272.description: The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Skill Seraphic Duet: Overture is increased by {0}. The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Skill Seraphic Duet: Encore is increased by {0}. While in Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture, when Tune Rupture DMG triggered by Resonance Skill Seraphic Duet hits the same target, the DMG Multiplier of Tune Rupture DMG trigger by Resonance Skill Seraphic Duet is increased by {1} for {2}s, stacking up to {3} times. While in , gain the following effects: - In the Stardust Resonance state, the DMG Multiplier of Fusion Burst triggered by Resonance Skill Seraphic Duet is further increased to {4} against the main target of the Fusion Burst. - When Fusion Trail is removed, the DMG Multiplier of Fusion Burst triggered by Resonance Skill Seraphic Duet is further increased to {5} against the main target of the Fusion Burst per Fusion Trail stack. - In combat state, when a target near the active Resonator in the team is defeated, immediately trigger the Fusion Burst based on the current stack limit of Fusion Burst on the target.

273.name: Fervor Sightly Burns Bright as New
273.description:
Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Finale</color>'s DMG Multiplier is increased by {0}.
<size=10></size>
In <color=Highlight><te href=121001>Instant Response</te></color>, Aemeath now inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=100002>Tune Rupture - Shifting</te></color> or <color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color> while charging <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Aemeath</color> or <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mech</color>, based on her current Resonance Mode.
<size=10></size>
Inherent Skill <color=Highlight>Between the Stars</color> is replaced with the following effects:
<size=10></size>
- In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture</color>, when Resonators in the team inflict <color=Highlight><te href=100002>Tune Rupture - Shifting</te></color> or deal <color=Highlight>Tune Rupture DMG</color>, Aemeath's Crit. DMG is increased by {1}, and Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Finale</color> now ignores {2} of DEF.
<size=10></size>
- In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst</color>, when Resonators in the team inflict <color=Highlight><te href=850180>Negative Status</te></color>, Aemeath's Crit. DMG is increased by {1}, and Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Finale</color> now ignores {2} of DEF.

274.name: Ethereal Waltz on Binary Tides
274.description: When casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Songs Across the Universe</color>, Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Debut of Meteoric Radiance</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight><te href=121008>Sync Strike</te></color> and Resonance Skill <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color>, Resonators in the team gain {0} All-Attribute DMG Bonus for {1}s.

275.name: Voyage to the Astral Shore
275.description:
When Aemeath's defeats a target directly with her skills, <color=Highlight><te href=121009>Starflux</te></color> is reset to {0}.
<size=10></size>
When taking fatal damage, Aemeath is knocked out and turns into <color=Highlight>2D Digital Ghost</color> for {2}s.
In the <color=Highlight>2D Digital Ghost</color> state, Aemeath grants Resonators in the team a Shield equal to {1} of her ATK for {3}. As she exits from the <color=Highlight>2D Digital Ghost</color> state, she revives and recovers {4} of her Max HP and {5} points of Resonance Energy. This effect can be triggered once every {6}m.
When Aemeath revives, she exits the <color=Highlight>2D Digital Ghost</color> state and removes the shield provided.

276.name: A Zephyr-Kissed Journey to You
276.description: Targets takes {0} more Resonance Liberation DMG from Aemeath. When in Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture, Aemeath's Tune Rupture DMG can critically hit, with a fixed Crit. Rate of {1}, and fixed Crit. DMG of {2}. When in Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst and out of combat, Fusion Burst DMG triggered on targets near the active Resonator in the team can critically hit, with a fixed Crit. Rate of {3}, and fixed Crit. DMG of {4}. The stacks of Rupturous Trail and Fusion Trail inflicted on the target through Forte Circuit To Sculpt the Silence is doubled. In Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture or Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst and out of combat, the max stack limit of Rupturous Trail or Fusion Trail on the targets near the active Resonator in the team is increased to {5}. When Aemeath casts Resonance Skill Seraphic Duet, she inflicts {6} stacks of Rupturous Trail or Fusion Trail on the targets within the range, lasting for {7}s.

params.name: Infinity Calibration
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Aemeath</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Aemeath</color></size>
Hold the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button to charge the attack by consuming STA, release to cast <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Aemeath: Charged I</color>, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
Hold the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button longer to cast<color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Aemeath: Charged II</color>, dealing higher <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
When in <color=Highlight><te href=121001>Instant Response</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Aemeath: Charged II</color> charges more quickly. Casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Aemeath: Charged II</color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mech: Charged II</color>, or Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Finale</color> ends <color=Highlight><te href=121001>Instant Response</te></color>.
This Skill DMG is considered <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation DMG</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> shortly after casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Aemeath: Charged I</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 2</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> shortly after casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Aemeath: Charged II</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 3</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack - Aemeath</color></size>
Consume STA to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 2</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter - Aemeath</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button shortly after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 4</color>.

1210005.name: Heavy Attack - Aemeath Charged I DMG

1210006.name: Heavy Attack - Aemeath Charged II DMG

params.name: Shared Voyage
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Form Switch</color></size>
Aemeath can switch forms between herself and her Mech. The Mech inherits Aemeath's Stats and unlocks new moves.
If there is a target nearby, Aemeath casts <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Stage 1</color> upon casting <color=Highlight>Form Switch</color>.
While in the Mech form, Aemeath casts <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> automatically upon casting <color=Highlight>Form Switch</color> in air.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Sync Strike: Armament Merge</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> shortly after casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 2, 3 & 4</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Sync Strike: Armament Merge</color>, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air.
Switch into the Mech form after casting this skill. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button shortly after to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 2</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Sync Strike: Call of Dawn</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> shortly after casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 2, 3 & 4</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Sync Strike: Call of Dawn</color>, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air.
Switch into Aemeath after casting this skill. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 2</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Mech</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air close to the ground.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Mech</color></size>
Hold the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button to charge by consuming STA, release to cast <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mech: Charged I</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
Hold the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button longer to cast <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mech: Charged II</color>, dealing higher <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
When in <color=Highlight><te href=121001>Instant Response</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mech: Charged II</color> charges more quickly. Casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Aemeath: Charged II</color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mech: Charged II</color>, or Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Finale</color> ends <color=Highlight><te href=121001>Instant Response</te></color></color>.
This Skill DMG is considered <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation DMG</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air close to the ground.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> shortly after casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mech: Charged I</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 2</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> shortly after casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mech: Charged II</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 3</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack - Mech</color></size>
Consume STA to perform Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 2</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter - Mech</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button shortly after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> button shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 4</color>.

1210102.name: Sync Strike: Call of Dawn DMG

1210107.name: Heavy Attack - Mech Charged I DMG

1210108.name: Heavy Attack - Mech Charged II DMG

params.name: Towards the Daybreak
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Heavenfall Edict - Overdrive</color></size>
Deal <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>. Switch into Mech form after casting this skill.
Can be cast in mid-air close to the ground.
Casting this skill grants the following effects:
- Enter <color=Highlight><te href=121002>Stardust Resonance</te></color> for {0}s.
- Enter <color=Highlight><te href=121003>Heavenfall Edict: Unbound</te></color> for {1}s.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 2</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> or Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Form Switch</color> shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 2</color>.
The next <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color> cast within {2} after casting this skill doesn't consume <color=Highlight><te href=121012>Rupturous Trail</te></color> or <color=Highlight><te href=121013>Fusion Trail</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Stardust Resonance</color></size>
Enhance the effect of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color>.
This effect ends after the {3}th time <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color> is cast.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavenfall Edict - Unbound</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict - Overdrive</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict - Finale</color>.
When in <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict - Unbound</color> and <color=Highlight><te href=121005>Resonance Rate</te></color> reaches the limit, enter <color=Highlight><te href=121001>Instant Response</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavenfall Edict - Finale</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> or <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Finale</color> when the following conditions are met:
- Be in the <color=Highlight><a href=星辉破界而来·于此释放></color> state.
- <color=Highlight><te href=121004>Synchronization Rate</te></color> reaches the limit.
- <color=Highlight><te href=121005>Resonance Rate</te></color> reaches the limit.
Casting this skill depletes all <color=Highlight><a href=同步率></color> and <color=Highlight><te href=121005>Resonance Rate</te></color>, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color> and ends the <color=Highlight><te href=121003>Heavenfall Edict: Unbound</te></color> state.
Switch back to Aemeath after casting this skill.
Can be cast in mid-air close to the ground.

params.name: Before All Sounds
params.description: In <color=Highlight><te href=121001>Instant Response</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Aemeath</color> and <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mech</color> gain {0} DMG Amplification.

params.name: Between the Stars
params.description: In Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture, when Resonators in the team inflict Tune Rupture - Shifting or deal Tune Rupture DMG, Aemeath's Crit. DMG increases by {0}, up to {1} times. Each Resonator can only trigger this effect once. With {2} stacks, Resonance Liberation Heavenfall Edict: Finale ignores {3} DEF on the target. Resonators joining the team or switching Resonance Mode resets this effect. In Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst, when Resonators in the team inflict Fusion Burst, Aemeath's Crit. DMG increases by {4}, up to {5} times. Each Resonator can only trigger this effect once. With {6} stacks, Resonance Liberation Heavenfall Edict: Finale ignores {7} DEF on the target. Resonators joining the team or switching Resonance Mode resets this effect.

params.name: Overture of Departure
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Songs Across the Universe</color></size>
Deal <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
Casting this skill enters <color=Highlight><te href=121006>Starlume Acceleration</te></color> for {0}s.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 3</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> and cast Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Form Switch</color> shortly after casting this skill to cast  <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 3</color> automatically.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Debut of Meteoric Radiance</color></size>
In the Mech form, <color=Highlight>Songs Across the Universe</color> is replaced by <color=Highlight>Debut of Meteoric Radiance</color>.
Deal <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
Casting this skill grants <color=Highlight><te href=121006>Starlume Acceleration</te></color> for {0}s.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 3</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> and cast Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Form Switch</color> shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 3</color> automatically.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Starlume Acceleration</color></size>
In <color=Highlight>Starlume Acceleration</color>, casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Overdrive</color> addtionally restores <color=Highlight><te href=121005>Resonance Rate</te></color>.
Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Overdrive</color> ends <color=Highlight>Starlume Acceleration</color>.

1210503.name: Songs Across the Universe Concerto Regen

1210504.name: Debut of Meteoric Radiance Concerto Regen

params.name: To Sculpt the Silence
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Seraphic Duo</color></size>
When casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 4</color> or <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 4</color>, if <color=Highlight><te href=121004>Synchronization Rate</te></color> is no less than {0} points, enter <color=Highlight>Seraphic Duo</color> for {1}s. 
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Resonance Skill - Seraphic Duet: Overture</color></size>
When Aemeath is in <color=Highlight>Seraphic Duo</color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> to cast Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Seraphic Duet: Overture</color>, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>, considered <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation DMG</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air.
Switch into the Mech form after casting this skill and exit the <color=Highlight>Seraphic Duo</color> state. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> within a certain period of time to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 2</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Resonance Skill - Seraphic Duet: Encore</color></size>
In the Mech form, when in <color=Highlight>Seraphic Duo</color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> to cast Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Seraphic Duet: Encore</color>, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>, considered <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation DMG</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air.
Switch back to Aemeath and exit the <color=Highlight>Seraphic Duo</color> state. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> within a certain period of time to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 2</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Resonance Mode</color></size>
- In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture</color>, when Resonators in the team respond to <color=Highlight><te href=100004>Tune Rupture - Interfered</te></color>, inflict <SapTag=2>{2}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=2} of <color=Highlight><te href=121012>Rupturous Trail</te></color> on the target for {4}s, stacking up to {3} times.
<size=10></size>
- In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst</color>, when Resonators in the team inflict <color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color>, inflict <SapTag=5>{5}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=5} of <color=Highlight><te href=121013>Fusion Trail</te></color> for {7}s, stacking up to {6} times.
While in combat, when the <color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color> on targets near the active Resonator reaches {8} stacks, inflict {9} stacks of <color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color>. If the targets have more than {10} stacks of <color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color>, trigger <color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color> based on its max stack limit and remove all of its stacks.
<size=10></size>
In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture</color>/<color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst</color>, inflict <color=Highlight><te href=100002>Tune Rupture - Shifting</te></color>/<color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color> when the following skills deal damage. The same skill can only trigger this effect on the same target once every {27}s:
<color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Aemeath Stage 3 & 4</color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Mech Stage 3 & 4</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Sync Strike: Armament Merge</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Sync Strike: Call of Dawn</color>, Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Songs Across the Universe</color>, and Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Debut of Meteoric Radiance</color>.
<size=10></size>
Resonance Skill <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color> gains the following enhancements based on Aemeath's <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode</color>:
- In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture</color>, casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color> additionally deals {11} instances of <color=Highlight>Tune Rupture DMG</color>, each time on a random target within the range. The target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> does not affect these instances of Tune Rupture DMG. When <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color> deals damage, remove the target's <color=Highlight><te href=121012>Rupturous Trail</te></color> and increases the DMG Multiplier of Tune Rupture based on the number of stacks removed, each stack increasing the DMG Multiplier by {12} for {28}s.
- In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst</color>, when Resonance Skill <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color> hits the target, if they are inflicted with <color=Highlight><te href=121013>Fusion Trail</te></color>, remove the <color=Highlight><te href=121013>Fusion Trail</te></color> stacks, and trigger the <color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color> on the target based on its max stack limit without removing its stacks. Each stack of <color=Highlight><te href=121013>Fusion Trail</te></color> removed increases the DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color> on the main target by {13}.
<size=10></size>
When in <color=Highlight>Stardust Resonance</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color> gains the following enhancements based on Aemeath's <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode</color>:
- In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture</color>, casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color> additionally deal {14} instances of <color=Highlight>Tune Rupture DMG</color>.
- In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst</color>, the DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color> triggered by Resonance Skill <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color> on the main target is additionally increased by {15}. The DMG Multiplier increase effect is stackable with that provided by <color=Highlight><te href=121013>Fusion Trail</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Tune Rupture Response - Starburst</color></size>
Active in <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture</color>. Deal <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color> to targets within range that are affected by<color=Highlight><te href=100004>Tune Rupture - Interfered</te></color>, considered Tune Rupture DMG.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Starflux Thrust</color></size>
When in the Mech form and <color=Highlight><te href=121009>Starflux</te></color> is more than {16}, use the Utility button to cast <color=Highlight>Starflux Thrust</color> by continuously consuming <color=Highlight><te href=121009>Starflux</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Synchronization Rate</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Synchronization Rate</color> is capped at {17} points.
- Dealing damage with <color=Highlight>Normal Attack - Aemeath</color>, <color=Highlight>Normal Attack - Mech</color> and Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Sync Strike: Armament Merge</color>, and <color=Highlight>Sync Strike: Call of Dawn</color> recovers <color=Highlight>Synchronization Rate</color>.
- Casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Songs Across the Universe</color> and <color=Highlight>Debut of Meteoric Radiance</color> recovers {18} points of <color=Highlight>Synchronization Rate</color>.
- Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Overdrive</color> recovers {19} points of <color=Highlight>Synchronization Rate</color>.
- When in <color=Highlight><te href=121001>Instant Response</te></color>, casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Aemeath</color> and <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mech</color> recovers {20} points of <color=Highlight>Synchronization Rate</color>. If <color=Highlight><te href=121003>Heavenfall Edict: Unbound</te></color> is also active, additionally recover {21} points of <color=Highlight>Synchronization Rate</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Resonance Rate</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Resonance Rate</color> is capped at {22} points.
- Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight><te href=121007>Seraphic Duet</te></color> recovers {23} points of <color=Highlight>Resonance Rate</color>.
- Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Overdrive</color> recovers {24} points of <color=Highlight>Resonance Rate</color>.
- When in <color=Highlight>Starlume Acceleration</color>, casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Heavenfall Edict: Overdrive</color> additionally recovers {25} points of <color=Highlight>Resonance Rate</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Starflux</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Starflux</color> is capped at {26} points.
<color=Highlight>Starflux</color> recovers naturally over time.
When in combat, <color=Highlight>Starflux</color> recovers at a slower rate.

params.name: Silent Protection
params.description:
When casting this skill, the following effects are triggered based on the <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode</color> Aemeath are in:
- In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Tune Rupture</color>: all Resonators in the team except Aemeath gain {0} All DMG Amplification for {1}s. The All DMG Amplification effect is increased to {2} for Resonators who inflict <color=Highlight><te href=100002>Tune Rupture - Shifting</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
- In <color=Highlight>Resonance Mode - Fusion Burst</color></color>: all Resonators in the team except Aemeath gain {0} All DMG Amplification for {1}s. The All DMG Amplification effect is increased to {2} for Resonators who inflict <color=Highlight><te href=850011>Fusion Burst</te></color>.
The effects reset when this skill is cast again.
Casting this skill resets the effects above.

params.name: Unlanded Melody
params.description:
When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, Aemeath can cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> shortly after casting <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color>.
<size=10></size>
Responding to <te href=100004>Tune Rupture - Interfered</te></color>: when Resonators in the team trigger <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target and cause them to be affected by <color=Highlight><te href=100004>Tune Rupture - Interfered</te></color>, Aemeath casts <color=Highlight>Tune Rupture Response - Starburst</color>. Each target can be damaged by this skill up to once every {0}s.
